title: Why This Matters: Usability + Mathematical Rigor

constraints.name: without_t_ext_unusable
constraints.notes: Pure operator engine requires expert to manually chain operators

constraints.name: without_t_int_no_intelligence
constraints.notes: Pure LLM agents lack compression, pattern reuse, measurable intelligence

constraints.name: dual_tract_achieves_both
constraints.notes: True Dual Tract provides both usability and intelligence

constraints.name: complete_pipeline_stages
constraints.expr: pipeline = Agent → NLP_Op → EncoderOp → PlannerOp → {L1_Op, L2_Op, L4_Op} → SynthesizerOp → RenderOp
constraints.notes: Full operator pipeline from natural language to formatted output

constraints.name: nlp_op_produces_goalspec
constraints.notes: NLP operator transforms text to structured GoalSpec

constraints.name: goalspec_has_domain
constraints.notes: GoalSpec contains domain field (e.g., 'auth') | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): has_field(GoalSpec, 'domain')

constraints.name: goalspec_has_target_psi
constraints.notes: GoalSpec specifies target Ψ metric (e.g., 0.85) | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): has_field(GoalSpec, 'target_Ψ') ∧ typeof(target_Ψ) = Real

constraints.name: encoder_op_produces_phi_g
constraints.notes: Encoder produces DGR vector φ_g from GoalSpec

constraints.name: plan_specifies_layers
constraints.notes: Plan specifies which internal tract layers to execute | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): has_field(Plan, 'layers') ∧ layers ⊆ {L1, L2, L3, L4, L5}

constraints.name: layer_ops_produce_r_i
constraints.notes: Each layer operator produces compression ratio R_i | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ i ∈ {1,2,3,4,5} : output(L_i_Op) contains R_i

constraints.name: r_i_is_compression_ratio
constraints.notes: R_i is a positive real number (compression ratio) | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): typeof(R_i) = Real ∧ R_i > 0

constraints.name: synthesizer_op_produces_summary
constraints.notes: Synthesizer converts metrics back to NL summary

constraints.name: render_op_formats_output
constraints.notes: Render operator formats summary for user presentation

constraints.name: system_measurable
constraints.notes: Every stage in pipeline has measurable performance | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ stage ∈ pipeline : measurable(stage)

constraints.name: system_optimizable
constraints.notes: Dual Tract architecture is optimizable (measurable → improvable)
